pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ascent Training Datasets // Datasets to be used primarily in conjunction with Ascent training materials but also for the book 'SAMS Teach Yourself R in 24 Hours' (ISBN: 978-0-672-33848-9). Version 1.0-7 is largely for use with the book; however, version 1.1 has a much greater focus on use with training materials, whilst retaining compatibility with the book.
